section.name: Beige-Accounting on Android.
section.p:
This is same WEB application based on embedded A-Jetty server for Android. Bob decided to try this application on his Android smart-phone. He install Google Chrome. Then he install Beige Accounting beige-accounting-android-1.1.3.apk from central Maven repository https://search.maven.org/#search%7Cga%7C1%7Cg%3A%22org.beigesoft%22. He started it then push button "Start" to start A-Jetty server. Then he push button "http://localhost:8080", chrome browser will be opened this address. If you can't set chrome as default browser, then type this address by hand in it (these screenshots from Samsung DUOS Android 4.2.2):
He upload database as bobspizza.sqlite into Google Drive from his notebook then download it on smart-phone then copy it into "BeigeAccountingBackup" directory. Then he open Database manager and restore bobspizza.sqlite as current database.
